./.title: Introduction
./.body:
Pepcy's Templates for OI and ICPC
自己的板子合集。
博客连接：pepcy.cf

001VimConfig/.title: Vim 配置
001VimConfig/.body:
Vim 配置
比赛时用的简易配置。

001VimConfig/vimrc.html.title: Vim 配置
001VimConfig/vimrc.html.body:
Vim 配置
syntax on
set nocompatible
set backspace=2
set tabstop=4
set softtabstop
set shiftwidth=4
set smarttab
set autoindent
set cindent
set smartindent
set number
set ruler
set cursorline
set scrolloff=3
set magic
set showmatch
set showcmd
set history=1000
set mouse=a
set hlsearch
set incsearch
set ignorecase
set smartcase

set printoption=paper:A4,syntax:n,wrap:y
set printdevice={{printer-name}}
noremap  :hardcopy
inoremap  :hardcopy

map  gg0vG$

noremap  u
inoremap  u

inoremap { {}

map  i#include int main() {return 0;

map  :w:!g++ % -o %
imap  :w:!g++ % -o %
